name: mqtt-wildcard
description: Match a MQTT Topic against Wildcards

scripts.test: camo-purge ; xo --space 4 --ignore test.js && node_modules/.bin/nyc node_modules/.bin/mocha ./test.js && node_modules/.bin/nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | node_modules/.bin/coveralls --force

author: Sebastian Raff <hq@ccu.io>
